column5: Well the small lakes and ponds finally have decent ice in Niagara so we went out perchin.  Chauffeur slept in so we missed the morning bite. Then we leave 3 hours later because his gf is cracking the whip ( can you say panty whipped?).  Well 3 hours and 3 perch is better than nothing.   Better luck, hopefully, tomorrow.
Not bad, look like a healthy bunch.  I'd rather be Perch-whipped on a day like today; panties can stick about all week. hahah
Maybe he likes being whipped. Good job with the perch, blame your lack of success on him. LMAO
I need to get out with you soon Bruce...prhaps some docks and some pike/perch fishin
And now for the after shot.  Brekkie
Great report and pics Bruce  Slow bite but what's important is you got out and had fun Morning breaky looks mighty delicious Thanks for sharing Jacques
